column4: Are there any other good Windows emulators? Wine isn't working very well for IMVU. It's 3d game, losta communicating with the server, and loading new objects. It also has a website with link that interact with the program, but thats not very important to me.
few 3D games will work *well* under emulation
Yeh, I know... But, meh, I don't know much about Linux, I was hoping there was some way
